name: Creality Ender-2
pre_gcode: M140 S{bed_temp}   ; need to heat the bed
M190 S{bed_temp}   ; wait for bed temperature
M104 S{temp}       ; need to heat the nozzle
M109 S{temp}       ; wait for nozzle temperature
M201 X500.00 Y500.00 Z100.00 E5000.00 ;Setup machine max acceleration
M203 X500.00 Y500.00 Z10.00 E50.00 ;Setup machine max feedrate
M204 P500.00 R1000.00 T500.00 ;Setup Print/Retract/Travel acceleration
M205 X8.00 Y8.00 Z0.40 E5.00 ;Setup Jerk
M220 S100 ;Reset Feedrate
M221 S100 ;Reset Flowrate
G28 ;Home
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G1 X10.1 Y20 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to start position
G1 X10.1 Y100.0 Z0.28 F1500.0 E8 ;Draw the first line
G1 X10.4 Y100.0 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X10.4 Y20 Z0.28 F1500.0 E15 ;Draw the second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F3000 ;Move Z Axis up
G90                ; absolute position required
post_gcode: G1 E-2 Z0.2 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
; PLEASE CHECK: G1 X0 Y{machine_depth} ;Present print
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
